body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
It is very hard to discover how to export a workflow history in JSON format. It is not found anywhere in tctl help. You have to specify `--output_filename` parameter in `workflow show` command. And the file will contain JSON.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Explicit flag that specifies output format. I would replace `--print_full` flag with `--outuput_format` that can be `short`, `full`, `json`, etc.

comments.body: I really like this idea. It would also simplify running tctl as a Docker container as one won't have to mount a volume into it.
@feedmeapples will this be addressed by your recent tctl enhancements?

a unified `--output` flag is added in https://github.com/temporalio/proposals/pull/31 that applies to all commands that do print golang structs, including History 

It's also implemented in tctl repo

title: tctl: Make it easy to export JSON version of history
